mapper.sql: t.CREATE_TIME as createTime,t.CREATOR_ID as creatorId,t.DICT_ID as dictId,t.ID as id,t.RANK as rank, t.pid as pid, t.VALUE as value,t.STATUS as status,t.TEXT as text,t.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime
mapper.update:
update sys_dict_item
CREATE_TIME = #{ createTime },
CREATOR_ID = #{ creatorId },
DICT_ID = #{ dictId },
ID = #{ id },
VALUE = #{ value },
STATUS = #{ status },
TEXT = #{ text },
RANK = #{ rank },
UPDATE_TIME = now(),
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dict_item t
and instr(t.TEXT,#{ t.text })>0
order by t.${sort} ${sortOrder}
order by t.CREATE_TIME DESC
